ml_tags: IN LOVING MEMORY 29-8-1915 - 16-8-1998 28-6-1926 - 21-10-2021 Free to roam forever more From desert scapes to ocean shores With all our love from all locations You're loving family across the nation Earnest Towson and loving wife Joyce Towson Thru the hardships and extremes Eternally in our hearts You triumphed and remained supreme
